title: Grimrack: An Infernal Epistolary
description: In a riff on C. S. Lewis' THE SCREWTAPE LETTERS, Geoffrey Wood's GRIMRACK is a collection of correspondences --emails this time-- between demons. With dark humor and biting wit, Professor Grimrack doles out devilish insights to the three tempter demons enrolled in his graduate seminar on the American Experiment.
author: Geoffrey  Wood
